entry.heading: Killing snakes for molding
entry.block: Some put a drop of aqua fortis into their mouths, which stupefies them, so that the head and the body look dead. But the head is still alive, and when you stick it with a needle in order to fix it to your mold, it moves and spoils and undoes everything. Therefore, to kill your snake, put it into a bottle filled with good vinegar and some spirits. Do the same with lizards and other similar animals.

If you want to keep them, you can put them in a pipe full of dirt in a garden outdoors, but it is necessary that the pipe be covered with latten wire, because otherwise, the snakes will crawl and climb up quite high.
